mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chatbot (client_id, sender, message, reg_date) VALUES (#{clientId}, #{sender}, #{message}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM chatbot WHERE client_id = #{clientId} ORDER BY reg_date ASC
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(ca.start, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') FROM counsel_reservation cr JOIN counsel_available ca ON cr.counsel_no = ca.counsel_no WHERE cr.client_id = #{clientId} ORDER BY ca.start ASC
